Collecting Monsters
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Collecting Monsters
By MikeSugs on Wednesday, November 22, 2000 - 02:04 pm:

One key into beating Monster Rancher Explorer, is collecting monsters. Levels 55-60, monsters are definantly a need to have. After completing stage 35 or 40, you get the monster keeper, which allows you to hold more then one monster. Search every stage for an object that looks like red wings. These take you to a bonus stage, that has many items, and 1 monster. Collect 4 disk fragments, and then come in contact with the monster. This should help a lot.

- MikeSugs

By Fade X on Thursday, November 23, 2000 - 02:42 pm:

By Fade X on Sunday, December 10, 2000 - 10:40 pm:

Find the Red Wing like item and goto the bonus stage. If you have a full disc you can catch a monster by touching it.
